name: Strawberry Chocolate Dessert Cups
description: These vegan chocolate cups with strawberry filling are the perfect vegan dessert. And you need only five ingredients to make them: dark chocolate, strawberries, cashews, maple syrup, and coconut milk. It's such an easy vegan recipe! And they're super rich and chocolatey. Big YUM!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cashews (soaked for 4-6 hours in water)
2 tablespoons full fat coconut milk ((should be firm))

recipeInstructions.text: First, melt the chocolate. Either in the microwave or on the stovetop.
recipeInstructions.name: First, melt the chocolate. Either in the microwave or on the stovetop.

recipeInstructions.text: Then coat 12 silicone cupcakes liners with the melted chocolate. Use about 1 teaspoon per cup. Gently press the chocolate up the sides of the liners using a spoon. Put the cups in the freezer for about 20 minutes. You could also use paper cupcake liners, but I prefer to use silicon ones.
recipeInstructions.name: Then coat 12 silicone cupcakes liners with the melted chocolate. Use about 1 teaspoon per cup. Gently press the chocolate up the sides of the liners using a spoon. Put the cups in the freezer for about 20 minutes. You could also use paper cupcake liners, but I prefer to use silicon ones.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the filling. Blend the cashews together with the strawberries, the maple syrup, and the coconut milk into a creamy mixture. Spoon the strawberry cashew mixture into the chilled chocolate cups, add a sliced strawberry on top, and cover with more melted chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the filling. Blend the cashews together with the strawberries, the maple syrup, and the coconut milk into a creamy mixture. Spoon the strawberry cashew mixture into the chilled chocolate cups, add a sliced strawberry on top, and cover with more melted chocolate.

recipeInstructions.text: Add another strawberry slice on top, sprinkle some coconut flakes on top, and put them back in the freezer.
recipeInstructions.name: Add another strawberry slice on top, sprinkle some coconut flakes on top, and put them back in the freezer.

recipeInstructions.text: You can enjoy them frozen or let them thaw for about 20 minutes before serving. Totally depends on what you like better. I usually prefer to eat them frozen though.
recipeInstructions.name: You can enjoy them frozen or let them thaw for about 20 minutes before serving. Totally depends on what you like better. I usually prefer to eat them frozen though.
